text.div:
DegreeInvasionBowelWall

This is the code indicates the maximum degree of local invasion into or through the bowel wall.

Copyright Statement: This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright Â© 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
    CodeDisplay
    373200003pT1: Tumour invades submucosa (colon/rectum)
    395706002pT2: Tumor invades muscularis propria (colon/rectum)
    395707006pT3: Tumor invades through the muscularis propria into the subserosa or into non-peritonealized pericolic or perirectal tissues (colon/rectum)
    384612007pT4a: Tumour directly invades other organs or structures (colon/rectum)
    384613002pT4b: Tumour penetrates visceral peritoneum (colon/rectum)
